citations.narrative:
There was a major change of substantial control or ownership of this business which occurred in late July 2023. The
licensee sold this business location with covered animals to new ownership. APHIS Animal Care was not notified within at
least 90 days of this change as required. It is imperative that APHIS Animal Care is notified and has accurate records
regarding ownership conducting regulated activities in order to enforce the Animal Welfare Act. A licensee must notify
Animal Care no fewer than 90 days and obtain a new license before any change in the name, address, substantial control
or ownership of business or operation. Additionally, if the licensee wishes to voluntarily terminate the license, they must
do so in writing to the Deputy Administrator.
Correct by close of business 12/04/2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.1(b)(1) 
   
Requirements and application 
There was a major change of substantial control or ownership of this business which occurred in late July 2023. The 
licensee sold this business location with covered animals to new ownership. APHIS Animal Care was not notified within at 
least 90 days of this change as required. It is imperative that APHIS Animal Care is notified and has accurate records 
regarding ownership conducting regulated activities in order to enforce the Animal Welfare Act. A licensee must notify 
Animal Care no fewer than 90 days and obtain a new license before any change in the name, address, substantial control 
or ownership of business or operation. Additionally, if the licensee wishes to voluntarily terminate the license, they must 
do so in writing to the Deputy Administrator. 
 
Correct by close of business 12/04/2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
